name: Yut
description:
Welcome to Yut Nori!

Yut Nori (윷놀이) is a traditional Korean board game. It is generally played during Korean New Year (설날).  

Each player starts with four 'horses' (말) (in this  case represented by red & blue gems) and tries to get their horses around the board first.  

Horses of the same color can stack up on each other in order to  move faster.  But beware -- if the other player lands on you, your horses will be sent back to the start.

If you land on a corner, your horse (or horses) will take a short cut.  Very sneaky!

Good luck! 🍀

* * *

Yut Nori is built using the LÖVE2d framework.
It is inspired by the traditional Korean board game, Yut.
All emojis designed by OpenMoji – the open-source emoji and icon project. License: CC BY-SA 4.0.
